title: Person Of Interest Soundtrack - When Things Explode
author: AshesInTheWind1
comment: Thank you... person of interest, for 5 years, of amazing characters, amazing stories, amazing episodes, amazing music, and amazing feelings. Thank you, thank you, thank you...

-Carter sold you out. They got to her.
-Yeah... they’re good at that. I want to thank you, Harold, for giving me a second chance.
-It’s not over, John. I’m close. Just get to the ground floor.

Hats off the person who selects the music for this show.  I have been introduced to
artists I might never had known about.
I've watched the scene about a thousand times. Never gets boring...
I liked this show very much i think its very underated , its just legendary inspiaring  , great acting , story , soundtrack , full of action , drama, moral values.
description: Unkle feat. Ian Astbury - When Things Explode, Person Of Interest 1x10
